name: Tiny Timer
body:
![ScreenShot](http://img812.imageshack.us/img812/8468/20120423031237.jpg)

This is a small simple portable countdown timer. When you run it, a prompt will pop out asking for the length of the countdown in minutes. It will then display a tooltip at the upper left corner (you can move it by clicking F2) showing the countdown. 

![ScreenShot2](http://img641.imageshack.us/img641/9066/20120423031357.jpg)

After countdown reaches 0, it will warn you by displaying a message box and playing a sound. 

The language used here is [AutoIt](http://www.autoitscript.com/site/autoit/). For instructions on compiling .au3 files see [here](https://github.com/matarz/tiny_timer/wiki/AutoIt-Files).
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
